001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Properties;
008
009/**
010 * Utility for loading {@link CaptureConfig} from Java {@link Properties} streams.
011 * <p>Stateless and thread-safe.</p>
012 *
013 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
014 */
015public final class CapturePropertiesLoader {
016  private CapturePropertiesLoader() {}
017
018  /**
019   * Reads key/value pairs from the supplied stream and builds a {@link CaptureConfig}.
020   *
021   * @param in properties stream; not closed by this method
022   * @return capture configuration derived from the properties
023   * @throws IOException if reading the stream fails
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  public static CaptureConfig load(InputStream in) throws IOException {
027    Properties props = new Properties();
028    props.load(in);
029    Map<String, String> kv = new HashMap<>();
030    for (String name : props.stringPropertyNames()) {
031      kv.put(name, props.getProperty(name));
032    }
033    return CaptureConfig.fromMap(kv);
034  }
035}
